title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. G, pt. 484 - Waste Transporter Program Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. G, pt. 484 - Waste Transporter Program Fees

State Regulations
§ 484.1 - Who must pay and how much
§ 484.2 - What the department reviews to determine the waste transporter program fee
§ 484.3 - Local agency delegation pursuant to ecl 27-0305
§ 484.4 - Exemption from fees for medical waste transporters
§ 484.5 - Exemption from fees for unused permits

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. G, pt. 484

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§3-0301, 72-0201

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
